spell_list.description: While active, any persistent spells that do not directly heal or cause damage have their durations increased. Any persistent spells that heal or cause damage have their durations reduced, allowing their effects to occur faster.  This does not apply to spells which have both beneficial and hostile components.
spell_list.description_pvp: While active, any persistent spells that do not directly heal or cause damage have their durations increased. Any persistent spells that heal or cause damage have their durations reduced, allowing their effects to occur faster.  This does not apply to spells which have both beneficial and hostile components.

effect_list.description: Increases duration of all other abilities by 10%
Reduces duration of all heals and damage spells by 10%

spell_list.name: Harmonization
